name: Farmland values and bidder behaviour in first-price land auctions

author.name: Carsten Croonenbroeck
author.affiliation: University of Rostock, Agricultural Economics Group, Rostock

author.name: Martin Odening
author.affiliation: Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin, Department of Agricultural Economics, Berlin

author.name: Silke Hüttel
author.affiliation: Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität Bonn, Institute of Food and Resource Economics, Production Economics Group, Bonn

publisher.name: Oxford University Press and Foundation for the European Review of Agricultural Economics
Oxford University Press and Foundation for the European Review of Agricultural Economics

abstract: We investigate potential asymmetries among bidders in land auctions that may entail market inefficiencies. Using representative data for eastern Germany including winning bids, bidder characteristics and land amenities, we pursue a structural approach to derive distributions of latent land values for different bidder groups. By applying non-parametric techniques, we cannot find evidence for distinct asymmetries while differentiating between legal entities, tenancy status and nationality of bidders. Our findings challenge the hypothesis that land privatisation via auctions discriminates against certain buyer groups – an argument that is often used to justify stricter regulation of agricultural land markets.
subject: C57
D44
Q12

citation: Croonenbroeck, C., Odening, M., & Hüttel, S. (2020). Farmland values and bidder behaviour in first-price land auctions. European Review of Agricultural Economics, 47(2), 558-590. doi:10.1093/erae/jbz025

dataset.name: BVVG Auction Data
dataset.description: Data from the major land privatising agency in Eastern Germany (Bodenverwertungs- und -verwaltungs GmbH) over the period 2007–2015, including winning bids, bidder characteristics, and land amenities.

variable_measured.name: Winning bid
variable_measured.description: The final bid amount for the land auction

variable_measured.name: Number of bids
variable_measured.description: Total number of bids placed in the auction

variable_measured.name: Distance buyer to plot
variable_measured.description: Distance from the buyer's location to the land plot

variable_measured.name: Share arable land
variable_measured.description: Proportion of the land that is arable

variable_measured.name: Average soil quality index
variable_measured.description: Index measuring the quality of the soil

variable_measured.name: Number of parcels
variable_measured.description: Number of parcels in the auctioned lot
